title: Manage a DOT Audit
description: A safety manager receives a notification of an upcoming DOT compliance audit and must prepare the required documentation.

tasks.description: Receive the audit notification and the list of requested documents (e.g., driver qualification files, hours-of-service logs, maintenance records).
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager understands the scope of the audit.

tasks.description: Generate reports from the system for the requested driver files.
tasks.expected_outcome: All requested DQ files are exported.

tasks.description: Generate reports for the requested HOS and maintenance records for the specified time period.
tasks.expected_outcome: All requested logs and records are exported.

tasks.description: Compile all documents into a digital folder to be securely provided to the auditor.
tasks.expected_outcome: All required documentation is gathered and organized for the audit.
